name: Róis
description: '''Rose Connolly''' (born 1999/2000), known mononymously as '''Róis''' ({{IPA|ga|ɾˠoːʃ|}} {{respell|ROE|sh}}, {{lit|[[rose]]}}, often capitalised '''RÓIS''') is a [[composer]], singer and [[multi-instrumentalist]] from [[County Fermanagh]], Northern Ireland. She is known for singing in a [[keening]] style, the traditional Irish [[lament]].
